Name: The Last Defense
About the game: -The evil necromancer, who sought the fall of all kingdoms on The Continent - Zuldan, has been brought back to life by his loyal servants. Only the Middle Kingdom- Murgaz, remained after barely defeating Zuldan and is now the home of all who survived his wrath. Take part in the battle as King Severin protect your kingdom. Build your own defense: Each part of the kingdom requires a different strategy to be defended, so you will need to place the towers carefully. Use the unique abilities of the mages: Each tower has a unique attribute and ability - make good use of it and oppose the assault! Follow the narrative: The Last Defense is the first part of a trilogy and the beginning of the story. Stay tuned with ThuGGames for more.
